metadata.title: CVE-2023-21137 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In several methods of JobStore.java, uncaught exceptions in job map parsingcould lead to local persistent denial of service with no additionalexecution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11 Android-12 Android-12LAndroid-13Android ID: A-246541702

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
